title: Platinum II ADC Main Looking for a Serious 5's Team
body:
Hello

I'm currently looking for a dedicated and committed team which are looking to improve in both a team environment and as an individual. Would highly prefer if the team is already established with a stable roster. 

Team Expectations
1. Dedicated and mature group of players.
2. Participate in scheduled practice weekly (2-4 sessions a week).
3. Strive to improve as a team and/or individual.
4. Players practice regularly.
5. Working microphone and stable internet.

About Myself
In Game Name: TRIPIN
Age: 16
Location/Timezone: Sydney, AEDT, UTC +11:00
Rank: Platinum II
Any previous experience in team environment: Gold II Team

Champion Pool: 
{{champion:22}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:67}} 

I'm more than happy to learn/improve in certain areas of my role. Please ask!

Feel free to contact me.
Hopefully see you on the Rift, TRIPIN.
